div.ab:
متولّي الحرب المذكور بحمل
رافعيها فيما سألوه على ما جرت به عادتهم
وأن يكون نزوله بحيث مستقر من تقدّم من الولاة
ولا يمكّن العربان ولا غيرهم من التّعرّض إلى دياراتهم
وموضع صلواتهم ورعاية ما يخصّهم
وحفظهم وصونهم ومنع من يتطرّق إليهم بأذيّة
وأن يعتمد ذلك كافّة الولاة والمتصرّفين و
وأن يقر بأيديهم بعد العمل به

********** mutawallī ăl ḥarbi ăl maḏkūr bi ḥamli
rāfiʿī hā fī mā saʾalū hu ʿalà mā ǧarat bi hi ʿādatu hum
wa ʾan yakūna nuzūlu hu bi ḥayṯu mustaqarru man taqaddama mina ăl wulāẗi
wa lā yumakkina ăl ʿurbāna wa lā ġayra hum mina ăt taʿarruḍi ʾilà diyārāti him
wa mawḍiʿi ṣalawāti him wa riʿāyaẗi mā yaḫuṣṣu hum
wa ḥifẓi him wa ṣawni him wa manʿi man yataṭarraqu ʾilay him bi ʾaḏiyyaẗ:in
wa ʾan yaʿtamida ḏālika kāffaẗu ăl wulāẗi wa ăl mutaṣarrifīna wa ********
wa ʾan yaqirra bi ʾaydī him baʿda ăl ʿamali bi hi

The aforementioned military governor [is ordered] to treat
the petitioners in the matter of their request according to what has been customary for them in the past
and that his residence should be where former governors have established themselves
and that he should not allow the Bedouins or others to interfere with their [the monks' buildings]
or their place of worship and he should respect their property,
protect and guard them and prevent any who would bring harm to them
and [it is ordered] that all governors, officials and ...... should obey this
and that it [this document] should remain in their hands after it has been acted upon.
